name: Fix Fix Bang Bang
description:
You, a pair of hotshot pilots, have just struck a tremendous blow against the evil Doctor Mandibles! Now, alone and unsupported in the distant reaches of space, you must work together to keep your vessel in one piece on the way back to your mothership, the Nova Komenco!

Fix Fix Bang Bang is an asymmetric local co-op game for two players in which the pilot flies the ship and shoots the baddies and the engineer runs around the ship keeping everything in working order!

How well one player is doing directly affects the other, so you have to work together to achieve victory! Communication is key!

Supports either one keyboard with two players, or up to two Controllers! Does not support online multiplayer (Though this does work via Parsec!)
